scripts.react:install: npm i && cd react/app && npm i && cd ../tile && npm i && cd ../../emulator && npm i
scripts.react: concurrently "cd react/app && npm run dev" "cd react/tile && npm run dev" "cd emulator && npm run dev"
scripts.svelte:install: npm i && cd svelte/app && npm i && cd ../tile && npm i && cd ../../emulator && npm i
scripts.svelte: concurrently "cd svelte/app && npm run dev" "cd svelte/tile && npm run dev" "cd emulator && npm run dev"
scripts.vanilla:install: npm i && cd vanilla/app && npm i && cd ../tile && npm i && cd ../../emulator && npm i
scripts.vanilla: concurrently "cd vanilla/app && npm run dev" "cd vanilla/tile && npm run dev" "cd emulator && npm run dev"
scripts.vue:install: npm i && cd vue/app && npm i && cd ../tile && npm i && cd ../../emulator && npm i
scripts.vue: concurrently "cd vue/app && npm run dev" "cd vue/tile && npm run dev" "cd emulator && npm run dev"
